content: * to end of round 8 10 12 sts decrease d desired height round 2 knit all sts switch to larger needles and knit 2 rounds in ribbing color repeat r1-2 until 8 8 8 sts remain between each marker placing marker every 24 sts on the second round repeat r1 until 2 sts remain between each marker doodle colorwork remove all markers except bor continue to k2tog until 8 5 6 sts remain looking for more instructions for using doodles see how to doodle with yarn pg 2 for an overview or finishing check out ultimate guide how to choose and arranging your doodle charts for more build a custom break yarn with approx 8 in 20 cm tail using a tapestry chart using my doodle chart pg 6 or use the pre- needle pull yarn through remaining sts and secure made charts available on the following pages weave in ends and block to measurements add optional pom pom if desired note join new mc/cc colors at the beginning of each new chart and break them when the chart is completed or carry up the inside if desired weave in ends as you go select your doodle chart and work it around the circumference once complete either change to work in stockinette like the samples or work additional doodle charts in the same manner working until your hat measures approx 2-3 in 5-7 5 cm less than desired finished height break all yarns except yarn for crown a note about the 48 st repeats while our pronoun charts are all 24 sts the combined pronoun charts i e they/them are 48 sts which means you will end up with back-to-back pronouns for the first/last repeat on size 2  they / them / they / them / they  if you don t want the same pronouns back-to-back feel free to use any other doodle chart in our doodle collections on the last repeat of the round such as trees animals flowers or more pacific knit co ©
